name: The death-veloper
description:
A point and click murder mystery game.

Try to unravel the mystery behind the death of a young developer, who has been murdered in the safety of his own home... 

Controls:

Click to move to your next point

Use S or back arrow to go back to your last point

You can use either wasd or arrowkeys to look around at some point in the game

Credits:
Pixelation shader: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/fullscreen-camera-effects/pixelation-65554 
Background music: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RdUj_7XMqkI 
Developer: Bas Dijkstra
Designer: Julia Berkouwer 
2D & Texture artist: Lenneke van Doorn
3D artist, sounddesign & voice actor of Clicky: Sander van Ispelen

Enjoy the journey! :D
